data.title: PINNY'S HOLIDAY by Racey Helps 1970 Medici Books for Children *2 Copies* London
data.text:
Description

PINNY'S HOLIDAY by Racey Helps. Medici Books for Children. The Medici Society Ltd. London 1970. 2 copies. Softcovers.

Books will be packed securely for safe shipment. Books will ship via USPS Media Mail, unless otherwise requested. If you would like to upgrade to an expedited shipping method, please contact me for a quote.

Please view the photos and contact me with any specific questions.

E4

**Please contact me with any questions prior to bidding. Check out my other listings now!**

***Please note: If you are bidding on a used or antique book... We do our best to accurately describe each book and identify any flaws it may have. If you have specific questions regarding its condition, please never hesitate to ask. Unfortunately, we cannot always inspect each page, and therefore grading is from visual inspection and browsing through the book. Unless stated otherwise, our books will contain signs of wear and age which is normal within the vintage/antiquarian category. We offer primarily used, vintage and antique books. Our books are stored in a dry, 100% smoke-free environment. We will always mention if a book has a noticeably unpleasant odor, however if you have a particularly sensitive sense of smell, we cannot recommend that you purchase any antique or vintage books.

Payment

Paypal Accepted.

Shipping

FREE USPS Media Mail shipping anywhere in the U.S.

**International Buyers please contact me for a shipping quote prior to purchase.**

Return Policy

We consider All Sales to be Final. Returns Accepted for Full Refund of Purchase Price only if item arrives significantly not as described. Shipping & Handling costs will not be refunded under any circumstances. Please be sure that this is the item you are looking for prior to bidding. If you have any questions about the content of an item, condition of an item or a question about any of our policies please do not hesitate to ask.

Feedback

If you were pleased with your purchase and experience with us please leave a feedback comment.
